comment: Mosaic... Need I say more? Perhaps the greatest humulus to be blessed upon us. So I added an assortment of different hops for bittering (2/3oz simcoe 2/3oz tohoma 2/3oz mosaic) and also hop SMaSHed my beer with about 8oz of fresh hops at 0min. Otherwise followed the recipe.... MMmmmosaics.... Smells delightful, tastes smooth, and has a great color.
